channel.title: RuneLite All you need is a dream
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/4332/rllogo.png[/img]
All You Need is Runelite and a Dream
RuneLite is Currently 53% Complete need to make it 100%
RuneLite Basic Information: Server Name: RuneLite Base Release: Matrix Original Release Cache Revision: 742 Client Revision: 718 Economy Type: Full Economy
RuneLite Update Log: Assembled RuneLite Team Downloaded Matrix Original Release Currently Fixing Cache Problems Updated To 742 Cache With Encrypted Mapdata Fixed Cache FPS Drop & Insane Lagg Issues Fixed Map Crashing Removed Evolution of Combat Items Update Fixed Cache Offheap Problem. Fixed Cache Configurations Fixed RuneLite Flag & Squeal of Fortune Sprites Changed a Few Item Definititions Fixed NPC Graphical Bug (See Mr Ex in Media) Player Accounts Save Every 5 Seconds Now (To Prevent Rollbacks) Implemented 100% RuneScape Lobby Added All Working Lobby Buttons & Chats Completed World 1 List Option Enabled Use of Capital Letters and Spaces for Lobby Removed The Ability To Create Accounts That Begin With "Mod", "Admin" & "Owner" Added 100% RuneScape MoneyPouch Adding Coins To The Pouch Withdrawing Coins From The Pouch Coins Picked Up Adds To Pouch Money Saves You Can Withdraw All Your Coins At Once By Entering a Number Higher Then What You Have In The Pouch Coins In Pouch Never Go Over Max Cash, It Checks Before Adding Whether They're a Drop, etc...) Fixed a MoneyPouch Bug MoneyPouch Open & Close Sound Effect Advanced Completionist Cape Requirements System Friends Chat Joining "RuneLite" upon logging in Only New Accounts Join The Chat Helpful For New Players That Join Fixed Player Titles That Are Supposed To Go After DisplayNames, Not Before World Message When New Accounts Are Created Added Starter Items (Currently None Added For Now) Added An Interface Showing The Most Recent Update In RuneLite, When a Player Logs In Added 95% Working RuneScape Squeal of Fortune Most Configurations Added To Squeal Spinning Stops On An Item Similar To How RuneScape's Stops On Items Claiming Items Adds Into The Inventory Fixed The Squeal of Fortune Spin Count Adding World Message When a Player Wins a Super-Rare Item Added a Global Teleportation Crystal Added Over 1,000 New NPCSpawns Added a World Message Level Up News Message Players Are Rewarded Two Squeal of Fortune Spins When Reached Level 99 In a Skill Added a New Tab That Is Used For Player Support Use Finishing Up On Squeal of Fortune Improved The Player Starter Kit Thieving Now Gives GP and Correct Amounts of Experience To Black People... I Mean Players Global Drop World Message System Reworking The Matrix Latest Update System Added a Loyalty Points System Added Summoning Pouch Creation Ability To Create All Pouches 100% Creation With The Correct Ingredients and Charms Need To Add Summoning Scrolls Creation Fixed The Skilling Interface Menu Finished The Latest Update System (RuneLite News) Implemented a Working Slayer Master & Tasks Working Task Assigning Change Task For a Fee Gives XP Per Kill Added Spria & Kuradal's Task Assignment Difficulty is Based On Slayer Masters (Spria Currently The Easiest To Assign) Easier Tasks = Lower XP + Lower Points Harder Tasks = Higher XP + More Points Add More Slayer Masters Need To Add Kuradal's Dungeon Redone Some of the World Message Coloring Completed The New Godwars Dungeon With New RuneScape Drops When a Player Becomes Maxed, Their Long Awaited Max Cape Spawns Immediatly Into Their Bank The Slayer Shop is now 100% Added! Added a Third Slayer Master Added Herblore Shop Media
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MYYkWwq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/M27HLV1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HyPbCx0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LPcrkpt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eH9KAKv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IxKVB0Z.png[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m1HG[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m1HA[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/19qwnc5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hVsY49k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9VjTtAv.png[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m3gE[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m3gK[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KVQXSR7.png[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m3wG[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IDgmQjc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rrtpx8D.png[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/m5pO[/img]
Spoiler for Extra Media:
[IMG]http://grab.by/m64s[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/mapm[/img] [IMG]http://grab.by/mc1w[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eWC3a4D.png[/img]
For Extra Updates=
Worked on RuneSpan Shop Added Sheathing and Unsheathing Added Ganodermic Beasts Added Clue Scrolls [B]Custom Login Music
Im not the owner of this but my friend bought this server called RuneLite.Arcanestream gave once the dl link after buying this so don't flame i continue hosting this because xiles quitted the project so arcanestream is working on a 666 server.I need java developers so we can develop this amazing 718/742 if you guys want proof ask to arcanestream
Skype me = dany.cristian2 only if you're a java developer
King Regards
Santa Coke

item.title: RuneLite All you need is a dream
item.dc:creator: @Ineed2BeGood Ineed2BeGood
item.description:
@Ineed2BeGood wrote:

                                                                            All You Need is Runelite and a Dream

                                                                           RuneLite is Currently 53% Complete need to make it 100%

RuneLite Basic Information:
Server Name: RuneLite
Base Release: Matrix Original Release
Cache Revision: 742
Client Revision: 718
Economy Type: Full Economy

RuneLite Update Log:
Assembled RuneLite Team
Downloaded Matrix Original Release
Currently Fixing Cache Problems
Updated To 742 Cache With Encrypted Mapdata
Fixed Cache FPS Drop & Insane Lagg Issues
Fixed Map Crashing
Removed Evolution of Combat Items Update
Fixed Cache Offheap Problem.
Fixed Cache Configurations
Fixed RuneLite Flag & Squeal of Fortune Sprites
Changed a Few Item Definititions
Fixed NPC Graphical Bug (See Mr Ex in Media)
Player Accounts Save Every 5 Seconds Now (To Prevent Rollbacks)
Implemented 100% RuneScape Lobby
Added All Working Lobby Buttons & Chats
Completed World 1 List Option
Enabled Use of Capital Letters and Spaces for Lobby
Removed The Ability To Create Accounts That Begin With “Mod”, “Admin” & “Owner”
Added 100% RuneScape MoneyPouch
Adding Coins To The Pouch
Withdrawing Coins From The Pouch
Coins Picked Up Adds To Pouch
Money Saves
You Can Withdraw All Your Coins At Once By Entering a Number Higher Then What You Have In The Pouch
Coins In Pouch Never Go Over Max Cash, It Checks Before Adding Whether They’re a Drop, etc…)
Fixed a MoneyPouch Bug
MoneyPouch Open & Close Sound Effect
Advanced Completionist Cape Requirements System
Friends Chat Joining “RuneLite” upon logging in
Only New Accounts Join The Chat
Helpful For New Players That Join
Fixed Player Titles That Are Supposed To Go After DisplayNames, Not Before
World Message When New Accounts Are Created
Added Starter Items (Currently None Added For Now)
Added An Interface Showing The Most Recent Update In RuneLite, When a Player Logs In
Added 95% Working RuneScape Squeal of Fortune
Most Configurations Added To Squeal
Spinning Stops On An Item Similar To How RuneScape’s Stops On Items
Claiming Items Adds Into The Inventory
Fixed The Squeal of Fortune Spin Count
Adding World Message When a Player Wins a Super-Rare Item
Added a Global Teleportation Crystal
Added Over 1,000 New NPCSpawns
Added a World Message Level Up News Message
Players Are Rewarded Two Squeal of Fortune Spins When Reached Level 99 In a Skill
Added a New Tab That Is Used For Player Support Use
Finishing Up On Squeal of Fortune
Improved The Player Starter Kit
Thieving Now Gives GP and Correct Amounts of Experience To Black People… I Mean Players
Global Drop World Message System
Reworking The Matrix Latest Update System
Added a Loyalty Points System
Added Summoning Pouch Creation
Ability To Create All Pouches
100% Creation With The Correct Ingredients and Charms
Need To Add Summoning Scrolls Creation
Fixed The Skilling Interface Menu
Finished The Latest Update System (RuneLite News)
Implemented a Working Slayer Master & Tasks
Working Task Assigning
Change Task For a Fee
Gives XP Per Kill
Added Spria & Kuradal’s
Task Assignment Difficulty is Based On Slayer Masters (Spria Currently The Easiest To Assign)
Easier Tasks = Lower XP + Lower Points
Harder Tasks = Higher XP + More Points
Add More Slayer Masters
Need To Add Kuradal’s Dungeon
Redone Some of the World Message Coloring
Completed The New Godwars Dungeon With New RuneScape Drops
When a Player Becomes Maxed, Their Long Awaited Max Cape Spawns Immediatly Into Their Bank
The Slayer Shop is now 100% Added!
Added a Third Slayer Master
Added Herblore Shop
Media

M27HLV1.png767×502

                                                                    Spoiler for Extra Media:




eWC3a4D.png766×501

For Extra Updates=

Worked on RuneSpan Shop
Added Sheathing and Unsheathing
Added Ganodermic Beasts
Added Clue Scrolls
[B]Custom Login Music

Im not the owner of this but my friend bought this server called RuneLite.Arcanestream gave once the dl link after buying this so don’t flame i continue hosting this because xiles quitted the project so arcanestream is working on a 666 server.I need java developers so we can develop this amazing 718/742 if you guys want proof ask to arcanestream

Skype me = dany.cristian2 only if you’re a java developer

King Regards

Santa Coke
